name: Chico Landi
introduction: Francisco Sacco Landi (born 14 July 1907 and died 7 June 1989) was an Italian Formula One driver who raced for non-works Maserati teams between 1951 and 1953. He also made a single appearance for the Maserati works team at the 1956 Argentine Grand Prix, where he scored his only career points in a shared drive with Gerino Gerini.
